trans-unit.source: Specifies processing rules or option settings for a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir behandlingen av regler eller innstillingene for en <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether writers that use the associated <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref> for context should use designer settings for writing content explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om forfattere som bruker den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"> </xref> for konteksten må bruke designer innstillinger for skriving innhold eksplisitt.

trans-unit.source: It influences the following behavior for the context that a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> passes to any <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>: - The RequireExplicitContentVisibility behavior only applies for properties where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A> is `false`, AND when a `ShouldSerialize` pattern is unavailable for the property value.
trans-unit.target: Den påvirker følgende virkemåte for konteksten som en <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>går til noen <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter>:-egenskapen RequireExplicitContentVisibility virkemåten gjelder bare for egenskaper der <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A>er `false`, og når en `ShouldSerialize` mønsteret er ikke tilgjengelig for egenskapsverdien.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the statement in the first bullet point is true, AND RequireExplicitContentVisibility is `true`, then designer settings determine whether the property writes its output as content or the property is considered implicit.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis uttrykket i det første punktet er true, og RequireExplicitContentVisibility `true`, og deretter designer innstillingene bestemmer om egenskapen skriver utdataene som innhold eller egenskapen anses implisitt.

trans-unit.source: Access to designer settings is through internal APIs in .NET Framework XAML Services and is based on reading <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> from backing assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til designer innstillinger er intern APIer i .NET Framework XAML Services og er basert på lesing <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>fra sikkerhetskopiering samlinger.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the internal code checks for the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibility?displayProperty=fullName> and writes its output to the property.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den interne koden søker etter verdien <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibility?displayProperty=fullName>og skriver utdataene til egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibility?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the content is considered implicit.

- If the statement in the first bullet is `true`, AND RequireExplicitContentVisibility is `false`, the property always writes its output, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> from backing assemblies is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis uttrykket i det første punktet `true`, og RequireExplicitContentVisibility er `false`, egenskapen skriver alltid utdataene, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>fra sikkerhetskopiering samlinger er relevant.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that writers that use this context should use designer settings for writing any output content in cases where <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic*> reports <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if designer settings should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>noen sender innhold i tilfeller der <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic*>rapporter til å angi at forfattere som bruker denne sammenhengen skal bruke designer innstillinger for skriving <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis designer innstillingene skal ignoreres.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsWritePublic*>
